abstract: A Saturday brain twister by Barry C. Silk.
snippet: A Saturday brain twister by Barry C. Silk.
lead_paragraph: SATURDAY PUZZLE — A good crossword puzzle will always remind you that you don’t know everything, and that goes double for Saturdays. No matter how much you think you might be up on your lingo, eventually someone will pull a TITFER on you out of nowhere and you’ll realize that there is still much to learn. Some people will find that unfair, but I think it makes life worth living. It’s also why I color my hair.
